quote: [T]he world we live in is governed by the most revolting bunch of crooks ever to defile the soil of this planet... [You] must never take them seriously, which is exactly what they want.
quote_letters: THE WORLD WE LIVE IN IS GOVERNED BY THE MOST REVOLTING BUNCH OF CROOKS EVER TO DEFILE THE SOIL OF THIS PLANET YOU MUST NEVER TAKE THEM SERIOUSLY WHICH IS EXACTLY WHAT THEY WANT
